rooms.description: A large open space combining kitchen and living area with a minimalist Brutalist aesthetic. Features exposed concrete walls and industrial finishes.
Sleek design inspired by Brutalist architecture. Equipped with built-in storage solutions and a home office nook.
Minimalist layout following Vastu principles to promote positive energy flow.

openings.description: Main entrance designed with reinforced concrete doors and minimalistic detailing.
Large window ensuring ample natural light while maintaining the Brutalist aesthetic.
Private entrance to the home office area integrated within the master bedroom.
